response: "I just can't keep up with everyone's expectations anymore. It's like I'm being pulled in a million different directions and I don't know who I'm supposed to be."
"Why does society make it seem like being perfect is the only way to be happy? I'm exhausted from trying to live up to these impossible standards."
"I feel like I'm losing myself in this quest for perfection. I don't even know what I want anymore, I'm just trying to please everyone else."
"Everywhere I look, there's someone who seems to have it all together. It's so overwhelming and it makes me question my own worth."
"I'm starting to question if I'll ever be good enough. No matter how much I achieve, there's always this lingering feeling of inadequacy."
